nodes.text: Displacement is an article written by August Hahn and Cynthia Hahn as a tie in to the Living Force campaign. It was published on the Wizards of the Coast website on November 18, 2004 and related the bounty hunters Caranna and Tendin Vought receiving a job. However, neither hunter was prepared to work with the other and ultimately Caranna incapacitated Vought with poison and took on the job herself.
In the context of the Living Force campaign, it marked the availability of certain items from the Star Wars Roleplaying Game Revised Core Rulebook.
